description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Phpwebgallery 1.4.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) login or (2) mail_address field in Register.php, or the (3) search_author, (4) mode, (5) start_year, (6) end_year, or (7) date_type field in Search.php, a different vulnerability than CVE-2006-1674.  NOTE: 1.6.2 and other versions might also be affected.
